Date: Wednesday, 4/9/1990
Subject: Mike Davis
Mike Davis is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Alex Fernandez
Dear Sir,
Alex Fernandez has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 1.04 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Tony Eusebio
Dear Sir,
Tony Eusebio has an AVG of .375 at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Charlie Mitchell
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 1.78, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
